vulnerability.name: USN-4252-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4252-1 fixed several vulnerabilities in tcpdump. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Multiple security issues were discovered in tcpdump. A remote attacker  could use these issues to cause tcpdump to crash, resulting in a denial of  service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in tcpdump. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
